author: minfrin
msg: Add a check to ap_die() to make sure the filter stack is sane and
contains the correct basic filters when an error occurs. This fixes
a problem where headers are not being sent on error.

author: minfrin
msg: Move the addition of default AP_HTTP_HTTP_HEADER filters to the
insert_filter phase so that other filters are not bypassed by default.

author: stoddard
msg: Update doc with info on Header echo directive

author: stoddard
msg: Add the 'echo' option to mod_headers Header directive. Use the new option
If a header received on a request matches regex, it is copied to the response
